descriptionHtml:
This Mod adds a very Powerful Conjuration Spell wich allows you to summon a Whiterun Guard.

Facts about the Whiterun Guard:

-Level 45
-One handed: 100
-Two handed: 100
-Can use fire spell \"Flames\"

Facts about the Spell:

Level: Adept
Magicka needed: 300 (with level 0 and no perks)
Book value: 250

Where to find the book:

You can find the book in the Jarl\'s Quarters of Dragonsreach on the rigth side of the door where you enter (screenshot)
You have to steal the book so beware of Guards.

If you like it or if you find any bugs please leave a comment ;)

Have fun!
author: T3rRoR_SoLdi3R
